title: Dynamics of Turbulence
description: Fundamental physics of turbulent flows.  Vorticity dynamics, Kolmogorov similarity hypotheses and nonlinear interactions. Mixing and dispersion. Direct and large-eddy simulations, Reynolds stress modeling.  Advanced topics.

prerequisites: AE 6012 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
